title: Social costs of curcular economy in European Union. (arXiv:2401.13675v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: Two fundamental issues are incorporated in the present monograph: the issue related to the quantification of the social costs and the issue, related to the defining of the circular economy concept as a theoretical model. The analysis is based on the methodology of the new institutional economics, which fact distinguishes it from the many other circular economy analysis based on the neo-classical methodological apparatus.
context:
Title: Social costs of curcular economy in European Union. (arXiv:2401.13675v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: Two fundamental issues are incorporated in the present monograph: the issue related to the quantification of the social costs and the issue, related to the defining of the circular economy concept as a theoretical model. The analysis is based on the methodology of the new institutional economics, which fact distinguishes it from the many other circular economy analysis based on the neo-classical methodological apparatus.
translated_title: 欧洲联盟循环经济的社会成本
translated_abstract: 本论文包含了两个基本问题: 社会成本的量化问题和循环经济概念的定义问题。分析基于新制度经济学的方法，这使得它与许多其他以新古典主义方法为基础的循环经济分析有所区别。
tldr: 这篇论文通过新制度经济学的方法，研究了欧洲联盟循环经济的社会成本，并定义了循环经济概念。
en_tdlr: This paper quantifies the social costs and defines the concept of circular economy in the European Union using the methodology of new institutional economics.
